ProjectGameVer3

Class Monk

  • java.lang.Object
    • ProjectGameVer3.Role
      • ProjectGameVer3.Hero
        • ProjectGameVer3.Monk

  • public class Monk
extends Hero
    The monk by default has a dodge chance of 33%.This is the specialty of the monk.
